title: Maintaining and Availability of Records: Monitoring
content:
Maintaining and Availability of Records: Monitoring

State Regulations
§ 7.41 - Availability of documents, tapes, disks and other data; data base to reflect commission eligibility status
§ 7.42 - Recording of telephone calls; monitoring by commission

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
